pages.text: 44|19|Arra ni taishite, komandeatte wa narimasen. Hontoni watashi wa meihakuna ken'i o motte, anata gata no tokoro ni yattekita nodesu.
44|20|Anata gataga (watashi o) ishi uchi ni surunara, watashi soshite anata gata no omode mo aru okata ni, sukui o motomemasu.
44|21|Moshi anata gataga, watashi o shinjinainaraba, watashi ni wa kamawanaide kudasai.'
44|22|Sokode, kare wa omoni ino~tsu(te i~tsu)ta. `Korera wa tsumibukai hitobitodesu.'
44|23|(-Nushi no o kotae ga atta. ) `Anata wa yoru no naka ni, waga shimo be to tomoni tabidate. Kanarazu anata gata ni otte ga kakarou.
44|24|Soshite umi wa (watatta nochi) waketa mama ni shite oke. Hontoni kare-ra wa, oborete shimau kotodearou.'
44|25|Kare-ra wa, ikaga ni oku no en to izumi o nokoshita ka.
44|26|Mata (yutakana) kokumotsu no hata to, kofukuna sumai o,
44|27|mata kare-ra ga soko de kyoraku shite ita yoi mono o (nokoshita ka. )
44|28|(Kare-ra no nochi wa) kodeatta. Soshite ware wa,-gai no min ni (sorera o) tsuga seta.
44|29|Kare-ra no tame ni, ten mo ji mo nakazu, kare-ra ni yuyo mo atae rarenakatta.
44|30|Ware wa, Isuraeru no shison o kutsujoku no chobatsu kara sukui,
44|31|firuaun kara (sukuidashita). Hontoni kare wa, koman de muhomonodeatta.
44|32|Ware wa omou tokoro ni yori, kare-ra o sho minzoku no ue ni eranda.
44|33|Soshite meihakuna shiren o fukumu, kazukazu no shirushi o ataeta.
44|34|Sate korera (makka no guzo shinja) wa (oroka ni mo) iu.
44|35|`Watashi-tachi wa saisho shineba (2-do to) okosa renai.
44|36|Moshi anata gata (no kotoba) ga shinjitsunara, watashi-tachi no sosen o tsuremodoshite mi nasai.'

44|37|Kare-ra (makka no guzo shinja) wa tobbau no min ka, mata sore izen no mono-tachi yori sugurete iru no ka. Ware wa kare-ra (sho minzoku) o horoboshita nodearu. Hontoni kare-ra wa tsumi o okashita monodeatta.
44|38|Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tawamure ni tsukutta node wanai.
44|39|Ware wa, tenchi to sonoaida no subete no mono o, tada shinri no tame ni tsukutta. Daga, kare-ra no oku wa rikai shinai.
